Name: H265ize
Overview: h265ize is a fire and forget weapon. A nodejs utility utilizing ffmpeg to encode large quantities of videos with the hevc codec. For more information visit ayrton.sparling.us.

Output Directory.Name: Output Directory
Output Directory.Description: The destination folder where you want your re-encoded video to be (recomended to be the parent directory of your input if you are planning to replace your source)

Input Directory.Name: Input Directory
Input Directory.Description: The source folder that contain video files you want to re-encode

Quantization Parameter.Name: Quantization Parameter
Quantization Parameter.Description: Quantization Parameter, read the h265 docs for more info

Quality Preset.Name: Quality Preset
Quality Preset.Description: ultrafast, superfast, veryfast, faster, fast, medium, slow, slower, veryslow, placebo | https://x265.readthedocs.io/en/default/presets.html for more info

temp Directory.Name: temp Directory
temp Directory.Description: This is the mnt directory of your unraid server<br>Container path: /mnt

mnt Directory.Name: mnt Directory
mnt Directory.Description: This is the temp storage directory to store your current conversion<br>Container path: /tmp
